modName: Lord of the Rings Weapons Pack Alpha
summary: Adds Lord of the Rings Weapons to Skyrim such as Anduril, Strider Sword, Uruk Hai Sword, Sting, and Saurons Mace
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://tomesos.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/headerupdate.png[/img]
[size=7]Weapons Pack Alpha[/size]

This is apart of The Tales of Middle Earth Siege of Skyrim mod by LPteam that we have been working on since Late 2011

You can find more pictures,videos,news,etc. all on our blog bellow

http://tomesos.com/

*Before you ask, we are not, in any circumstances, and never have been or helped by merp, so please stop asking, we do however support merp, we wish them the best.*

Leave a comment bellow!


*Important* 
You can find all the weapons in a chest in Belethors in Whiterun

Weapons Include:

Anduril
Striders Sword 
Uruk Hai Sword (Hiddin)
Sting
Saurons Mace (Unfinished Texture but because where nice we added it) 

And more that you must find! 

if you have any questions email us at lpteam@tomesos.com
author: LPteam

files.name: Lord of the Rings Weapons Pack Alpha
